about.title: About SmartFinance
about.description: We are SmartFinance, a startup created by Software Engineering students from the Peruvian University of Applied Sciences of Peru, who have come together to create a solution with which people can keep track of their personal finances and feel comfortable and safe.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to provide people with an easy-to-use solution to take control of their personal finances.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: At SmartFinance, we see ourselves as a benchmark in creating accessible and practical financial solutions for Peruvians.

values.title: Values
values.description: Finzar values financial education, accessibility, and empowering its users to make informed and responsible financial decisions.
